name: Sonar
description:
Sonar!

What started as a 48 hour game jam, Sonar is a 2D puzzle platformer, where sound is sight! play as a cute bat, as he navigates to the exit of a cave ready to collapse, in order to ever see his friends and family again. Utilize your built in echo location to illuminate your surroundings!

Credits:
Jordan Cogswell - Lead game and SFX programmer
Colin Matthews - Game asset designer
Andre-Phillip Cormier - Music designer
Kevin Goguen - Small assets programmer
Luc Deveau - Game tester
Kyle Breen - Game tester
